title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - May 31 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - May 31 2022
description:
Recap of law enforcement response to Uvalde shooting. Trudeau freezes handgun ownership in Canada. C&B take a call on the Sussmann trial verdict. Comedian Bill Burr on guns. Caller with law enforcement experience on the Uvalde shooting. Clay's rave review of Top Gun: Maverick.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
